msg: Reverted r790567 and altered the invoice sub menu to use the new request-confirmation link attribute

author: lektran
msg: Add to new attributes to the Menu Widget's link element:
request-confirmation - if set to true displays a dialog requesting confirmation from the user before proceeding
confirmation-message - the confirmation request message to be displayed if the above is set to true
This removes the need to put javascript inside the menu widget when requesting confirmation
